appDesc.message: Lightweight extension for Twitch TV notificaiton and popout.

copyright.message: EzTwitch © 2016 Howar31 All Rights Reserved

msg_intro_p2.message: This is a light-weight extension for Twitch TV.  You can simply get live notification, following channel list and easy popout windows for video and chat.

msg_intro_p3_1.message: EzTwitch does not need any login information.  All you have to do is set the Twitch ID in the

msg_intro_p3_2.message: , and EzTwitch will automatically handle other stuffs for you.

msg_intro_p4_1.message: Twitch ID is not set.  Please set the ID in

msg_nostream_p1.message: EzTwitch cannot find any live stream now.

msg_nostream_p2_1.message: There is no live stream currently, or Twitch ID set in

msg_nostream_p3.message: EzTwitch will automatically refresh and check later.

stream_game_title.message: Click to browse this game on Twitch

label_txt_TwitchID_title.message: EzTwitch will check this Twitch ID's following channels.No need to login, just set the ID and EzTwitch will handle the other stuffs.

txt_TwitchID_title.message: Only Tiwtch ID is needed.EzTwitch does not need any password or login information.

label_chk_Notification_title.message: While checked, enable notifications when EzTwitch detects stream is going live.While unchecked, disable all the notifications.

label_chk_vPopout_title.message: While checked, EzTwitch will open stream video in popout window.

label_chk_vPopout.message: Open stream video in popout window

label_chk_cPopout_title.message: While checked, EzTwitch will open stream chat in popout window.

label_chk_cPopout.message: Open stream chat in popout window

label_chk_vPanel_title.message: While checked, EzTwitch will open stream video in panel.

label_chk_cPanel_title.message: While checked, EzTwitch will open stream chat in panel.

label_num_PSH_title.message: Set the Width x Height for popout stream video window.

num_PSW_title.message: Set the Width for popout stream video window.

num_PSH_title.message: Set the Height for popout stream video window.

PSDefault_title.message: Reset the popout stream video window size to default: 1014x600

label_num_PnSH_title.message: Set the Width x Height for popout stream video panel.The Chrome Panel has size limit from 80x46 to 672x540 when first opening.  Any values exceed the range might not work properly.

num_PnSW_title.message: Set the Width for popout stream video panel.

num_PnSH_title.message: Set the Height for popout stream video panel.

PnSDefault_title.message: Reset the popout stream video panel size to default: 646x400

label_num_PCH_title.message: Set the Width x Height for popout stream chat window.

num_PCW_title.message: Set the Width for popout stream chat window.

num_PCH_title.message: Set the Height for popout stream chat window.

PCDefault_title.message: Reset the popout stream chat window size to default: 400x600

label_num_PnCH_title.message: Set the Width x Height for popout stream chat panel.The Chrome Panel has size limit from 80x46 to 672x540 when first opening.  Any values exceed the range might not work properly.

num_PnCW_title.message: Set the Width for popout stream chat panel.

num_PnCH_title.message: Set the Height for popout stream chat panel.

PnCDefault_title.message: Reset the popout stream chat panel size to default: 400x540

label_chk_oldPopout.message: [Compatibility] Use the old Twitch popout url

label_chk_oldPopout_title.message: Use the old Twitch popout url which was depricated by Twitch official.The old url should be redirected to the new one by Twitch.  But you can still try this if the popout is not working correctly.

label_chk_HTML5Popout_title.message: Use HTML5 player instead of Flash Player to lower the CPU and RAM usage.  Not working if stream was opened in webpage or old popout.

btn_save_title.message: Save all the settings in this Option page.

v_popout_note.message: If both popout window and panel options are not checked, the stream will open in a new tab.

c_popout_note.message:
Unlike stream popout settings, if both popout window and panel options are not checked, EzTwitch will open nothing for chat.
So you can literally open a stream in new tab and it's chat in panel, or open a stream video in panel and it's chat in popout window!

panel_note.message: To use Chrome Panel, please go to chrome://flags/#enable-panels and set it to Enable. Otherwise, Chrome will open as popout window instead of panel.

option_note.message:
Chrome does not support manual language selection for extensions.
To change EzTwitch display language, please change your Chrome browser language in chrome://settings/languages .

clog_101_1.message: Fix the description in Chrome Store page.

clog_110_1.message: Separated video and chat popout settings.

clog_110_3.message: Add Changelog, now you can see what's new!

clog_110_4.message: Add About for extension and dev info.

clog_120_1.message: Fix the live stream notification function.

clog_120_2.message: Now support HTML5 player.  Turn it on in Options.

clog_120_3.message: Now support Chrome Panel.  Make your stream and chat stay on top or minimize with Chrome Panel!

clog_120_4.message: Added right click menu to temporarily override the open mode without the need for changing options!

clog_122_1.message: HotFix right click menu overflow by dynamically expand popup height.

clog_123_1.message: Update due to Twitch API changes: Client-ID required for Kraken API calls

clog_124_1.message: Change the embed url to popout url for Dark Mode UI option.

clog_124_2.message: Fix the issue that some live channels are not showing up.

about_info_note.message: Thanks for using EzTwitch.  This is an open source project created by Howar31 and hosted on GitHub.  Welcome to give any review, problem report or suggestion in Chrome Web Store support page.

aboute_donate_note_1.message: EzTwitch is a totally free Chrome extension.  You do not need to pay anything to get everything.  And there is also no 3rd party ads in EzTwitch.

aboute_donate_note_2.message: However, if you like my work, you may support me via Paypal donation.  You can decide the amount of donation.  And I am really appreciate for your generosity! (∩´∀`∩)
